data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab, India will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 10,941 believers in Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jat Dhariwal (Hindu traditions) people might believe through him.
Jesus, please help the 10,941 believers in the county of Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.focus_label: Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab, India

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
